members.name: immersiveWidth
members.description: The width of the screen in immersive mode.

members.name: immersiveHeight
members.description: The height of the screen in immersive mode.

members.name: leanMode
members.description: Hide system UI until user interacts.

members.name: showUnderStatusBar
members.description: Extend your app underneath the status bar (Android 4.4+ only).

members.name: showUnderSystemUI
members.description: Extend your app underneath the system UI (Android 4.4+ only).

members.name: immersiveMode
members.description: Hide system UI and keep it hidden (Android 4.4+ only).
